summary.description: > VERY_LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'neuroscience', 'discovery-driven', 'neuroethology', 'non-genetically' | The state of discovery-driven neuroscience research and experimental organism usage in the United States | BIO Proposal Processing Changes (nsf11078) | NSF's mission is to advance the progress of science, a mission accomplished by funding proposals for research and education made by scientists, engineers, and educators from across the country | National Science Foundation - Where Discoveries Begin | As you are no doubt aware, the proposal workload across the Foundation has increased dramatically over the past decade | The National Science Foundation: A Brief History | Dear Colleague Letter: BIO Proposal Processing Changes
